title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama instance.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, uploading docs, RAG, multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, prompt templates, and conversation management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama generators and chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, embeddings, etc.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server plus optional GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, docs, or commit messages via Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and markdown rendering for Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and note Q&A powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to answer channel messages with Ollama.
